content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":151031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　なんだこの部屋は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What is this room?\""},{"lineNumber":151032,"originalJapaneseLine":"何もない部屋に違和感を覚えた刹那――","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment he felt something strange about the empty room—"},{"lineNumber":151033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どわあああああ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaahhh!?\""},{"lineNumber":151034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様、煙が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lance-sama, there's smoke!?\""},{"lineNumber":151035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こら、ペルエレ、これは――！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Hey, Peruere, this is—!?\""},{"lineNumber":151036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふあっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff...\""},{"lineNumber":151037,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに喋ることが出来たのはそこまで。","translatedEnglishLine":"That was as far as Lance could speak."},{"lineNumber":151038,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで気絶するように皆が眠ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone fell asleep as if fainting."},{"lineNumber":151039,"originalJapaneseLine":"睡眠ガスによって。","translatedEnglishLine":"By sleeping gas."},{"lineNumber":151040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、使ったの初めてだけど、効果覿面って奴ね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yeah, it's the first time I've used it, but it's incredibly effective.\""},{"lineNumber":151041,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなぐっすり寝るなんて」","translatedEnglishLine":"They sleep so soundly like this.\""},{"lineNumber":151042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはは、使われてたら危なかったかも。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahaha, it could've been dangerous if they had used it on us."},{"lineNumber":151043,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ギリギリセーフ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just barely safe.\""},{"lineNumber":151044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「呑気に言うんじゃないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't say that so casually.\""},{"lineNumber":151045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やー、それにしてもペルエレが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, even so, Peruere—"},{"lineNumber":151046,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当はスパイだったなんてねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought you were really a spy.\""},{"lineNumber":151047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「直前で裏切ってくれなきゃ危なかった、ね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you hadn’t betrayed us at the last minute, it would've been dangerous, right?"},{"lineNumber":151048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、経歴聞けば裏切って当然なんだけどさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, hearing your background, betraying us was expected anyway.\""},{"lineNumber":151049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ペルエレ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Peruere."},{"lineNumber":151050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方はこれで良かったのかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Was this really what you wanted?\""},{"lineNumber":151051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良かったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was it good?\""},{"lineNumber":151052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、そりゃまーね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, yeah, of course."},{"lineNumber":151053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　故郷にはクソみたいな思い出しかないし、","translatedEnglishLine":"I only have shitty memories of my hometown,"},{"lineNumber":151054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なーんの未練もないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and no regrets at all.\""},{"lineNumber":151055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I see.\""},{"lineNumber":151056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":151057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それじゃあ、改めて歓迎させてもらう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, let me properly welcome you."},{"lineNumber":151058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようこそ、ケッセルリンク様の城へ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Welcome to Lord Kesselring's castle,"},{"lineNumber":151059,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ペルエレ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruere.\""},{"lineNumber":151060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただし」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However,"},{"lineNumber":151061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":151062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一つだけお願いが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have just one request...\""},{"lineNumber":151063,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":151064,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":151065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":151066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、ここは……私は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Where is this... I...\""},{"lineNumber":151067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、おはよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, good morning.\""},{"lineNumber":151068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ペル、エレ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Peru, Ere...?\""},{"lineNumber":151069,"originalJapaneseLine":"気づけばシーラは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Before she knew it, Sheila"},{"lineNumber":151070,"originalJapaneseLine":"とある一室のベッドで眠っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was sleeping on a bed in a certain room."},{"lineNumber":151071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えと……確か私達は、眠って……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Umm... if I remember correctly, we were asleep..."},{"lineNumber":151072,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで、そこから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, from there...\""},{"lineNumber":151073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――ッ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—!?"},{"lineNumber":151074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ペルエレ、みんなは！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Peruere, what about everyone else!?\""},{"lineNumber":151075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうして私達、眠って――ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why did we fall asleep—!?"},{"lineNumber":151076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":151077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ペルエレ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Peruere?\""},{"lineNumber":151078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごめんなさい、失敗した」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sorry, I failed.\""},{"lineNumber":151079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":151080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら作戦が最初からバレてたみたいでね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems the plan was leaked from the very start.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何もない部屋に違和感を覚えた刹那――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment he felt something strange about the empty room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに喋ることが出来たのはそこまで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was as far as Lance could speak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで気絶するように皆が眠ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone fell asleep as if fainting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、使ったの初めてだけど、効果覿面って奴ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yeah, it's the first time I've used it, but it's incredibly effective."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなぐっすり寝るなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They sleep so soundly like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、使われてたら危なかったかも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha, it could've been dangerous if they had used it on us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やー、それにしてもペルエレが
本当はスパイだったなんてねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought you were really a spy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「直前で裏切ってくれなきゃ危なかった、ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you hadn’t betrayed us at the last minute, it would've been dangerous, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、経歴聞けば裏切って当然なんだけどさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, hearing your background, betraying us was expected anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方はこれで良かったのかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was this really what you wanted?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 故郷にはクソみたいな思い出しかないし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I only have shitty memories of my hometown,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんの未練もないわ」
「それじゃあ、改めて歓迎させてもらう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let me properly welcome you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようこそ、ケッセルリンク様の城へ、
とある一室のベッドで眠っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was sleeping on a bed in a certain room.
"Umm... if I remember correctly, we were asleep...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして私達、眠って――ッ！」
「どうやら作戦が最初からバレてたみたいでね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems the plan was leaked from the very start."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
